data.text: @TJ0059 Great to see definitive evidence but ghastly that our media, government and educational institutions were willfully complicit in permeating a false narrative and directly doing much harm to children and the rest of the population through vile and unnecessary measures
@TJ0059 The whole thing is a lie and it’s got us just where they’d planned

@TJ0059 @rebecca_morgan The entire germ theory which the plandemic is based upon is a fraud, all of it Rockefeller allopathy is the antithesis to Naturopathy, maintaining a optimally healthy immune system proves these people are psychopaths murdering you. They killed most my fam but they won't get me.
@HowarthsWay Those professionals carrying out the study were not just Chinese.
@TJ0059 A tourist who it turned out was taking medication for flu

@TJ0059 This lie about asymptomatic transmission has permeated into every institution like schools etc. We repudiate the claim citing this study, only to be met with “we you cannot trust the Chinese” with no hint of irony given Christian Drosten created the myth citing a Chinese tourist
